titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Washington State Vassar Club Records, 1909-1956 (bulk 1945-1957)
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Materials relating to the creation and subsequent activities of the Washington State Vassar Club.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: Small groups of Vassar College Alumnae living in the Seattle began meeting informally as early as 1906, but it wasn't until 1945 that The Puget Sound Vassar Club was formed. The club is still active but is now known as the Washington State Vassar Club.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Washington State Vassar Club Records contain the club's constitution, correspondence, mailing lists and meeting minutes. The bulk of the collection is from the years the group was known as the Puget Sound Vassar Club. Also included is a register from the Alaska-Yukon-Pacific Exposition, which was held in the summer of 1909. Although the register was apparently meant to be a list of Vassar alumnae who attended the exposition, many people with no connection to the college added their signatures.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

odd.head: Encoding Information
odd.p: Finding aid encoded by Jason Kovari, 12 Mar 2009

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collection processed by Archives and Special Collections Library staff.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Puget Sound Vassar Club Records were a gift of Jane T. Merritt (VC 1981), June 1992.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Puget Sound Vassar Club Records, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.
